title: Ebro In The Morning - Back from MDW + Ranked Choice Voting with Omar Suarez
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning.

On this episode, Omar Suarez, Director of Partnerships and Outreach at NYC Votes came to Ebro in the Morning to discuss Rank Choice Voting (1:14).

Ebro hosts a classic segment of You Played Yourself (44:30) and talks about parental expectations (1:00), DJ Kast One hosts DJ John's regular segment (38:00), the crew remembers the Tulsa Race Massacre (57:20), and Laura Stylez has her patented Flashing Lights segments (35:12 & 1:11:00).

Please like and subscribe to Ebro In The Morning.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
